response.overview: O Prema Devathe is a Kannada drama starring K Shivaram, Vijesh Saigal, Madhura, Prasannakshi, H Hanumanthaiah, directed by Shankaralinga Sugnalli. Sidharath, Akshay, Asha and Sheela are friends working at the film institute. Akshay loves Asha but she dies in an accident. Siddharth loves a village girl but she likes Akshay. Who marries the village girl forms the rest of the story.
response.title: O Prema Devathe
